wikipedia_page.main: Sir Edward John Watson Gieve,  (born 20 February 1950) is a former British civil servant, who served as Deputy Governor for Financial Stability of the Bank of England and an ex officio member of the Monetary Policy Committee from 2006 to 2009.

response: Sir John Gieve chairs the organisation. Ravi Gurumurthy is the organisation's Chief Executive.
*Sir John Gieve KCB, (born 1950), Deputy Governor of the Bank of England
